auth.description: Welcome to the tribe, where you will have access to our holistic directory of all wellbeing coaches and experts, wellness news, articles, programs, events and more.

header.title: Your conscious journey into wellbeing starts here
header.subtext: An all-inclusive wellbeing portal for you to find the best coach or expert to support your journey!

events.title: Events
events.subtext: Find our latest wellness programs and events.

about.title: Improve the quality of your life and wellbeing
about.subtext: Forget about stressing over finding the perfect coach/ expert, because we take it upon ourselves to gather for you the best qualified coaches/ experts and carefully vet them to bring you a range of authentic, well-intended specialists to guide you in your journey. Our Servvices include one-on-one sessions, group sessions, and many more, with the choice of either working face-to-face or from the comfort of your home.

experts.title: Our Experts
experts.subtext: Our team of well-rounded experts specialize in different fields to bringing significant experiences and knowledge to support you achieve  your goals.

schedule.title:
Ready to feel better?
Book your 1:1 session today!
schedule.subtext: Our professionals share a passion for empowering and helping clients overcome their life obstacles and reach their goals in the healthiest manner.

activation_requests.title: Activation Request
activation_requests.expert_no_payment_data: The expert has no Tap Business ID, this could happen for two reasons: the expert did not fill in the payment details or there was an error when trying to create a business in the Tap service.

about.title: We Believe in Health is for All.

legacy.title: Our Legacy
legacy.text: We believe that people should have a safe space to come and feel welcomed, with all their challenges, broken pieces, and everything they've been told that, it can’t be healed.

chief.title:
Tribe Chief
Hamad (The Nourisher) Al Saad
chief.certified: CERTIFIED HOLISTIC HEALTH & FOOD PSYCHOLOGY COACH
chief.info:
An advocate of self-love and wellbeing, Hamad believes that for people to live a better life, they need to have harmony with every aspect of your lives. As most people put alot of effort on how they train and eat, not considering their mental state, emotions, thoughts, sleep etc to name of few. So he wanted to build this platform to create more awareness on how people can improve the quality of their lives, to educate them and to make it easier for them to seek help from the right coaches and experts, to embark on their healing journey with trust and accountability.
With over 10 years experience in the field of health and wellbeing, he has built a tribe of trusted, passionate certified coaches and experts from different specialties, bringing them together to be easily found and linking them with people that need their support and to bring out their their full potential.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.quest1: What do I need to qualify for signing up as an Expert?
faq.quest2: What if I have an injury or physical condition?
faq.quest3: What types of programs do you offer for kids?
faq.quest4: How many times should I practice a week?
faq.quest5: Do I need to sign up for a session in advance?
faq.quest6: Is there an age limit to practicing yoga?
